## Entity.remove() method

Remove one or more Component types from this Entity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
remove(...types: Array<string>): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  types | Array&lt;string&gt; | Component type\[s\] to remove from this Entity. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

This Entity.
